::Zardus/FZ::

"You may," Zardus replies, "Havoc and Demolition will accompany you, 
they know their way around a bit."

He nods to Havoc and Demolition, the bots moving to the entrance of 
the IF to wait for Life and Allanon.

Zardus looks up Hellbat as the bot adresses him, nodding. "Yes, you 
may. Do you need any equipment or repairs? The base is being moved 
right now, so you'll need to wait for quarters. But repairs are in 
that ship."

He points to the Iron Fist, Havoc and Demolition standing at the 
entrance. "Ask those two where the CR chambers are if you need them. 
If you don't, you can participate in this mission."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ nods, acnowledging the bow. "You've been out for a few months," he 
says, looking Delta over, realizing that the CR changed him a bit.

"How are you feeling?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
